name: qrmenu-saas
description: Sistema SaaS de pedidos por QR Code para restaurantes

scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:infra && npm run dev:services
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n "backend,web,admin" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill && npm run dev:infra:stop
scripts.kill:all:down: npm run kill && npm run dev:infra:down
scripts.restart: npm run kill && npm run dev:services
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run install:all && npm run dev:infra && node -e "setTimeout(()=>{},5000)" && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
